properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. 40 FOOT S/V SYTIBURON-36, WHITE HULL, THREE
   PERSONS ON BOARD, DISMASTED AND ADRIFT IN
   41-00.235N 052-03.587W. VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   RCC BOSTON, PHONE: 617 223 8555,
   E-MAIL: RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 229/13.
